Tall Sizes. Made for guys $6^{\prime}4^{\prime\prime}$ or taller with waists measuring less than their chest.  

Men's Tall Size Chart   

LTXLT2XLT3XLT4XLTChest42-44"46-48"50-52"54-56"58-60"Waist36-38"40-42"44-46"48-50"52-54"  

Big Sizes. Made for guys $6"3"$ or shorter with waists measuring the same or bigger than their chest.   
Men's Big Size Chart   

1XB2XB3XB4XB5XBChest46-48"50-52"54-56"58-60"62-64"Waist42-44"46-48"50-52"54-56"58-60"

Men's apparel is sized according to several key body measurements. To get accurate measurements, wear undergarments only; do not measure over clothing.  

Once you know your body measurements, consult the Size Chart and Fit Tips on the product pages to determine which size you should purchase.
